1.0.name: wordpress/easy-theme-options
1.0.description:
This plugin adds the ability to create as many site options as you want to customize your theme or your website.

Special Features

You can easily create many field types such as:

  • Text input
  • Password input
  • Textarea
  • Checkbox
  • Select list / Dropdown
  • Multi checkbox
  • Radio Button
  • Taxonomy dropdown
  • Posts list / Custom Post Type list
  • Repeatable elements (with drag n' drop)
  • Date field (with date picker)
  • Upload field (using media library)
  • Slider
  • Color Picker
